Detailed Description

Convenience class for implementing an action that activates a save filter.

This class is provided for developers who write save filters to easily create an action that will activate the filter to save a file. Simply subclass DzSaveFilterAction, and provide your save filter class name along with any of the optional arguments. Then add the class to the classes exported by your plug-in with DZ_PLUGIN_CLASS_FACTORY().

DzSaveFilterAction subclasses are automatically added to the main menu under 'File > Save As > Script Based'.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzSaveFilterAction::DzSaveFilterAction ( const char *  filterClassName  )  [protected]

Creates a new DzSaveFilterAction. To create a new save filter action, you must subclass DzSaveFilterAction, and provide the name of the DzSaveFilter subclass that is activated by the action.

Parameters:
filterClassName The name of the DzSaveFilter subclass that is activated by this action.
